results.title: Effect of Lisinopril and Verapamil on Angiopoietin 2 and Endostatin in Hypertensive Diabetic Patients with Nephropathy: A Randomized Trial.
results.text_hl: Angiotensin-converting enzyme inhibitors (ACEI) and calcium channel blockers (CCB) have an important role in @<m>DISEASE_Diabetic_Nephropathies</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003928 @@@DN@@@. We performed a randomized-controlled trial of @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ alone (an ACEI) or in combination with @CHEMICAL_Verapamil @CHEMICAL_MESH:D014700 @@@verapamil@@@ (a CCB) as a therapy for @<m>DISEASE_Diabetic_Nephropathies</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003928 @@@DN@@@ in @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus_Type_2 @DISEASE_MESH:D003924 @@@type 2 diabetes mellitus@@@ (@DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus_Type_2 @DISEASE_MESH:D003924 @@@T2DM@@@) @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertension@@@ (@DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@HTN@@@) and urinary @GENE_ALB @GENE_213 @@@albumin@@@ @CHEMICAL_Creatinine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D003404 @@@creatinine@@@ ratio (UACR) (30-300 mg/g) also to evaluate their effect on UACR, the angiogenic proteins: @GENE_ANGPT2 @GENE_285 @@@Angiopoietin 2@@@ (@GENE_ANGPT2 @GENE_285 @@@Ang-2@@@) and @GENE_COL18A1 @GENE_80781 @@@Endostatin@@@ (@GENE_COL18A1 @GENE_80781 @@@EST@@@).

citations.NLM: Salem M, Sallam AM, Abdel-Aleem E, El-Mesallamy HO. Effect of Lisinopril and Verapamil on Angiopoietin 2 and Endostatin in Hypertensive Diabetic Patients with Nephropathy: A Randomized Trial. Horm Metab Res. 2021 Jul;53(7):470-477. PMID: 34282598
citations.BibTeX: @article{34282598, title={Effect of Lisinopril and Verapamil on Angiopoietin 2 and Endostatin in Hypertensive Diabetic Patients with Nephropathy: A Randomized Trial.}, author={Salem M and Sallam AM and Abdel-Aleem E and El-Mesallamy HO}, journal={Horm Metab Res}, volume={53}, number={7}, pages={470-477}}

results.title: Renin-angiotensin system inhibition reverses the altered triacylglycerol metabolic network in diabetic kidney disease.
